name: Nosferatu: Rites of the Skull Cult
name_original: Nosferatu: Rites of the Skull Cult
description:
1921, La Laguna

The City of La Laguna suffers the scourge of a devastating plague. Mysterious disappareances, corpses with unsettling marks on their necks, pests... It may seem that the city is cursed. And Thomas knows for certain that it is.

There is a Vampyre in town

Being a descendant of a vampire hunter, Thomas has the means to vanquish the creature. But the Order of the Skull will protect its master by all means.

Features
  • Single player
  • Classic hack'n'slash arcade
  • Smooth pixel art characters
  • 4 scenarios, 9 enemies, 3 boss encounters!
  • Can be finished in under an hour (if you don't die too much)
  • Locations and story inspired by Nosferatu (1922) in its 100th anniversary and the City of La Laguna (Canary Islands, Spain), declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1999
Controls
  • Keyboard & mouse: WASD to move, mouse to aim, SPACE to attack.
    Special powers explained on-screen.
  • Gamepad. Use sticks, right trigger and follow on-screen instructions.

There's a presskit.zip file in the downloads section with everything you may need!
